</image>   <item rdf:about="https://www.jiscmail.ac.uk:443/cgi-bin/webadmin?A2=FOODDESIGN;fcdcf165.1502">   <title>CALL FOR PAPERS - Second International Conference on Food Design </title>   <link>https://www.jiscmail.ac.uk:443/cgi-bin/webadmin?A2=FOODDESIGN;fcdcf165.1502</link>   <description> Dear members of the list,<br><br>this is an extended version of the call for papers for your consideration:<br><br>Second International Conference on Food Design<br>New York City on November 5-7, 2015.<br>hosted by The New School<br>www.fooddesign2015.com<br><br>On behalf of The New School, the International Food Design Society, and Food Design North America, we are thrilled to announce the Second International Conference on Food and Design, which will take place on November 5-7, 2015, at The New School in New York City. [...]    </description>   <dc:date>2015-02-21T11:34:40+13:00</dc:date>   <dc:creator>Francesca Zampollo</dc:creator>   <dc:identifier>https://www.jiscmail.ac.uk:443/cgi-bin/webadmin?A2=FOODDESIGN;fcdcf165.1502</dc:identifier> </item>  <item rdf:about="https://www.jiscmail.ac.uk:443/cgi-bin/webadmin?A2=FOODDESIGN;1782012f.1502">   <title>CALL FOR PAPERS - Second International Conference on Food Design, NYC 5-7 November 2015 </title>   <link>https://www.jiscmail.ac.uk:443/cgi-bin/webadmin?A2=FOODDESIGN;1782012f.1502</link>   <description> Dear members of the list,<br><br>it is with immense pleasure that I announce here the Second International Conference on Food Design, which will be in New York City on November 5-7, 2015.<br>It will be hosted by The New School.<br><br>please find below the Call for Papers and see the website for more information: www.fooddesign2015.com [...]    </description>   <dc:date>2015-02-21T11:23:59+13:00</dc:date>   <dc:creator>Francesca Zampollo</dc:creator>   <dc:identifier>https://www.jiscmail.ac.uk:443/cgi-bin/webadmin?A2=FOODDESIGN;1782012f.1502</dc:identifier> </item>  <item rdf:about="https://www.jiscmail.ac.uk:443/cgi-bin/webadmin?A2=FOODDESIGN;76accdb7.1502">   <title>Re: Call for applications - Critical Studies on Food in Italy Summer 2015 Program </title>   <link>https://www.jiscmail.ac.uk:443/cgi-bin/webadmin?A2=FOODDESIGN;76accdb7.1502</link>   <description> Dear Salem,<br><br>Thank you for your email. I would be very interested in taking one of your courses. Do you have any available scholarships? I’m from the U.K.<br><br>Kind Regards,<br><br>Jessica<br><br>On 13 Feb 2015, at 21:54, salem paulos &lt;salem.paulos@GUSTOLAB.COM&lt;mailto:salem.paulos@GUSTOLAB.COM&gt;&gt; wrote:<br><br>Apologies for the cross-posting!<br><br>Dear Colleagues,<br><br>Please kindly forward this information to students that may be interested. [...]    </description>   <dc:date>2015-02-14T13:56:27+00:00</dc:date>   <dc:creator>Rosa, Jessica</dc:creator>   <dc:identifier>https://www.jiscmail.ac.uk:443/cgi-bin/webadmin?A2=FOODDESIGN;76accdb7.1502</dc:identifier> </item>  <item rdf:about="https://www.jiscmail.ac.uk:443/cgi-bin/webadmin?A2=FOODDESIGN;96726a9f.1502">   <title>Call for applications - Critical Studies on Food in Italy Summer 2015 Program </title>   <link>https://www.jiscmail.ac.uk:443/cgi-bin/webadmin?A2=FOODDESIGN;96726a9f.1502</link>   <description> Apologies for the cross-posting!<br><br>Dear Colleagues,<br><br>Please kindly forward this information to students that may be interested.<br><br>Dear Students,<br>There are a few days left to apply to the Critical Studies on Food in Italy<br>Summer 2015 program!<br><br>The Critical Studies on Food in Italy Summer 2015 program is a 5-week<br>program that takes place from May 18 to June 20, 2015 in Rome, Italy [...]   </description>   <dc:date>2015-02-13T22:54:54+01:00</dc:date>   <dc:creator>salem paulos</dc:creator>   <dc:identifier>https://www.jiscmail.ac.uk:443/cgi-bin/webadmin?A2=FOODDESIGN;96726a9f.1502</dc:identifier> </item>  <item rdf:about="https://www.jiscmail.ac.uk:443/cgi-bin/webadmin?A2=FOODDESIGN;64c5f09f.1502">   <title>International Journal of Food Design - submissions March 15 </title>   <link>https://www.jiscmail.ac.uk:443/cgi-bin/webadmin?A2=FOODDESIGN;64c5f09f.1502</link>   <description> Dear members of the list,<br><br>this is just a quick message to those of you interested in publishing in<br>the new International Journal of Food Design:<br><br>if you are interested in having your article in the *first issue*, please<br>send your papers by *March 15*. Thank you!<br>I copy again the call for papers below. [...]   </description>   <dc:date>2015-02-11T19:02:04+13:00</dc:date>   <dc:creator>Francesca Zampollo</dc:creator>   <dc:identifier>https://www.jiscmail.ac.uk:443/cgi-bin/webadmin?A2=FOODDESIGN;64c5f09f.1502</dc:identifier> </item>  <item rdf:about="https://www.jiscmail.ac.uk:443/cgi-bin/webadmin?A2=FOODDESIGN;e41df947.1501">   <title>reminder: open call for International Journal of Food Design </title>   <link>https://www.jiscmail.ac.uk:443/cgi-bin/webadmin?A2=FOODDESIGN;e41df947.1501</link>   <description> Dear Members of the list,<br><br>This is to remind those of you involved in research related to Food Design, that the call for papers for the International Journal of Food Design is open.<br><br>In particular: those of you interested in trying to have their paper published in the first issue of the journal, should try and submit by February 15, 2015. Thank you. [...]    </description>   <dc:date>2015-01-08T17:26:46+13:00</dc:date>   <dc:creator>Francesca Zampollo</dc:creator>   <dc:identifier>https://www.jiscmail.ac.uk:443/cgi-bin/webadmin?A2=FOODDESIGN;e41df947.1501</dc:identifier> </item>  <item rdf:about="https://www.jiscmail.ac.uk:443/cgi-bin/webadmin?A2=FOODDESIGN;ae3f00c4.1410">   <title>Introducing the International Journal of Food Design </title>   <link>https://www.jiscmail.ac.uk:443/cgi-bin/webadmin?A2=FOODDESIGN;ae3f00c4.1410</link>   <description> Dear Members of the list,<br><br>it is with great joy that I introduce to you the new International Journal of Food Design.<br>The fist and only peer-reviewed academic journal on Food Design.<br><br>We define Food Design as simply the discipline that connects food and Design: Design applied to food and eating, or food and eating investigated from a Design perspective. In other words, among all knowledge on food and eating, we look at research where Design has an important role, and among all knowledge on Design, we look at research that focuses on aspects of food or eating.<br>More info [...]   </description>   <dc:date>2014-10-11T22:09:33+01:00</dc:date>   <dc:creator>Francesca Zampollo</dc:creator>   <dc:identifier>https://www.jiscmail.ac.uk:443/cgi-bin/webadmin?A2=FOODDESIGN;ae3f00c4.1410</dc:identifier> </item>  <item rdf:about="https://www.jiscmail.ac.uk:443/cgi-bin/webadmin?A2=FOODDESIGN;18c05fd.1409">   <title>Re: In Search of Meaningful Food </title>   <link>https://www.jiscmail.ac.uk:443/cgi-bin/webadmin?A2=FOODDESIGN;18c05fd.1409</link>   <description> Dear Francesca I saw your post on your facebook page. Your topic research was very interesting for me (In Search of Meaningful Food) and I Would be very happy to assist you in completing your research data. So I try to have a look your video several times but I didn\ufffd\ufffd\ufffdt succeed. Because youtube is districted by Iran\ufffd\ufffd\ufffds government unfortunately. Anyway I hope that this project will bring good results for you. Good luck. Reyhaneh Sanei MA- Industrial design- Art university of Tehran- Iran. On Sunday, September 14, 2014 8:05 AM, Francesca Zampollo <francesca.zampollo@GMAIL.COM> wrote: Dear members of the list, [...]   </description>   <dc:date>2014-09-14T04:32:26-07:00</dc:date>   <dc:creator>Reyhaneh Sanei</dc:creator>   <dc:identifier>https://www.jiscmail.ac.uk:443/cgi-bin/webadmin?A2=FOODDESIGN;18c05fd.1409</dc:identifier> </item>  <item rdf:about="https://www.jiscmail.ac.uk:443/cgi-bin/webadmin?A2=FOODDESIGN;81ab760d.1409">   <title>In Search of Meaningful Food </title>   <link>https://www.jiscmail.ac.uk:443/cgi-bin/webadmin?A2=FOODDESIGN;81ab760d.1409</link>   <description> Dear members of the list,<br><br>I write to share with all of you my latest research project: In Search of Meaningful Food.<br>Please have a look at this video for all information: https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=dFwf5aW-rh0<br><br>let me know what you think!<br><br>best regards<br>francesca   </description>   <dc:date>2014-09-14T04:32:39+01:00</dc:date>   <dc:creator>Francesca Zampollo</dc:creator>   <dc:identifier>https://www.jiscmail.ac.uk:443/cgi-bin/webadmin?A2=FOODDESIGN;81ab760d.1409</dc:identifier> </item>  <item rdf:about="https://www.jiscmail.ac.uk:443/cgi-bin/webadmin?A2=FOODDESIGN;35b83082.1407">   <title>Call for Graduate Students (Food Studies and related areas) </title>   <link>https://www.jiscmail.ac.uk:443/cgi-bin/webadmin?A2=FOODDESIGN;35b83082.1407</link>   <description> *Apologies for the cross-postings! *<br><br>*Looking for a place to do your Food Studies research project or (masters)<br>thesis work?*<br><br>This is a unique opportunity for students to display their talent within<br>our field of research, on International research projects about Food<br>Systems, Food Education and Pedagogy, Food Security and Food &amp; Culture and<br>to collaborate with some of our partners in the food field (FAO, BCFN<br>Foundation, AMIExpo, SlowFood, Cerealia Festival, other U.S. University<br>food-oriented research centers) [...]   </description>   <dc:date>2014-07-25T18:50:53+02:00</dc:date>   <dc:creator>salem paulos</dc:creator>   <dc:identifier>https://www.jiscmail.ac.uk:443/cgi-bin/webadmin?A2=FOODDESIGN;35b83082.1407</dc:identifier> </item>   </rdf:RDF>
